dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause of the high VCORE usage.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal chain but did not explicitly mention the CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE percentage but missed specific DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or recommendations were provided.
